entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries beginning in the evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 02 January 2023
